subject: Re: Test EJB 2.0 entity Beans with JUnit and ServerTestCase extension
msgSnippet: Hi, I made a small change to the JUnit ServerTestCase to get it work on WebLogic Server 7.0. In TestRunnerSessionBean.java I changed Class
messageBody:
Hi,

I made a small change to the JUnit ServerTestCase to get it work on
WebLogic Server 7.0.
In TestRunnerSessionBean.java I changed
Class theClass=Class.forName(testClassName);
to
Class theClass=Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader
().loadClass(testClassName);

Tell me if this was helpful to you.

Regards,
Kari
